atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Injects Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Scaffolds out new CSS rules based on existing utility classes.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Tells Tailwind which layer a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Specifies which Tailwind config file to use when compiling that CSS file.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Lets you generate new utility classes with variants applied.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: An alias for the @variants directive with responsive variants preconfigured.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Generates media queries that map to your breakpoints.
